mapper.update:
UPDATE do
do_code = #{doCode},
ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode},
USER_ID = #{userId},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId},
WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount},
PRODUCT_AMOUNT = #{productAmount},
ORDER_DELIVERY_FEE = #{orderDeliveryFee},
ORDER_DELIVERY_FEE_INSURANCE_TYPE = #{orderDeliveryFeeInsuranceType},
ORDER_DELIVERY_FEE_INSURANCE_AMOUNT = #{orderDeliveryFeeInsuranceAmount},
ORDER_PROMOTION_DISCOUNT = #{orderPromotionDiscount},
ORDER_GIVE_POINTS = #{orderGivePoints},
ORDER_DELIVERY_FEE_ACCOUNTING = #{orderDeliveryFeeAccounting},
ORDER_DELIVERY_SERVICE_TYPE = #{orderDeliveryServiceType},
ORDER_DELIVERY_METHOD_ID = #{orderDeliveryMethodId},
expect_receive_date_start = #{expectReceiveDateStart},
expect_receive_date_end = #{expectReceiveDateEnd},
expect_receive_time_start = #{expectReceiveTimeStart},
expect_receive_time_end = #{expectReceiveTimeEnd},
ORDER_REMARK_USER = #{orderRemarkUser},
ORDER_REMARK_MERCHANT2USER = #{orderRemarkMerchant2user},
ORDER_REMARK_MERCHANT = #{orderRemarkMerchant},
ORDER_BUSINESS_TYPE = #{orderBusinessType},
ORDER_MESSAGE_PHONE = #{orderMessagePhone},
GOOD_RECEIVER_ID = #{goodReceiverId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_ADDRESS = #{goodReceiverAddress},
GOOD_RECEIVER_POSTCODE = #{goodReceiverPostcode},
GOOD_RECEIVER_NAME = #{goodReceiverName},
GOOD_RECEIVER_MOBILE = #{goodReceiverMobile},
GOOD_RECEIVER_PHONE = #{goodReceiverPhone},
GOOD_RECEIVER_COUNTRY_ID = #{goodReceiverCountryId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_COUNTRY = #{goodReceiverCountry},
GOOD_RECEIVER_PROVINCE_ID = #{goodReceiverProvinceId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_PROVINCE = #{goodReceiverProvince},
GOOD_RECEIVER_CITY_ID = #{goodReceiverCityId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_CITY = #{goodReceiverCity},
GOOD_RECEIVER_COUNTY_ID = #{goodReceiverCountyId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_COUNTY = #{goodReceiverCounty},
GOOD_RECEIVER_AREA_ID = #{goodReceiverAreaId},
GOOD_RECEIVER_AREA = #{goodReceiverArea},
ORDER_INVOICE_TYPE = #{orderInvoiceType},
status = #{status},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE ID = #{id}
